Texts.Eng:
A mysterious race of cave dwellers known for their underground cities and love for treasure. Adapted to the deep underground, they can jump high and take less fall damage. Due to their impressive eyesight, they have higher precision with weapons.
    
  Diet: Omnivore, can eat raw meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  +^green;15^reset;% Jump, +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  Resist: +^green;40^reset;% Fire, +^green;10^reset;% Poison, +^green;10^reset;% Shadow
  Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  ^green;Medium visibility in darkness^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Heat and Mud

^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Shortsword: Damage x^green;1.12^reset; and +^green;20^reset;% Knockback Resistance
  Dagger and Spear: Damage x^green;1.12^reset; and +^green;5^reset;% Crit Chance
  Machine pistol: Damage x^green;1.1^reset; and +^green;1^reset;% Crit Damage
  Sniper Rifle: +^green;3^reset;% Crit Chance and +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
  Shotgun: Damage x^green;1.12^reset; and +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
  Boomerang and Chakram: Damage x^green;1.12^reset; and +^green;2^reset; Defense
  Shield: Perfect Blocks ^green;increase Defense^reset;(stacks)

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Resist: -^red;30^reset;%Electric, -^red;40^reset;%Ice
  ^red;Sunlight and irradiated planets^reset;:
    ^red;Reduced Energy, Health and Radiation Resistance^reset;.
